text: Gyllene Tider is a pop band from the town of Halmstad in Sweden. == Discography == * 1978 Gyllene Tider EP (Gula EP-en) * 1980 Gyllene Tider LP * 1981 Moderna Tider * 1982 Puls * 1984 The Heartland Café * 1990 Parkliv! * 1996 Gyllene Tider EP ("Gå & fiska) * 1997 Återtåget Live! * 2005 Finn 5 fel! * 2004 GT25 * 2013 Dags att tänka på refrängen ==Other websites== Category:Swedish pop music groups Category:Halmstad Category:1977 establishments in Sweden
title: Gyllene Tider
